website_summaries.verdict: Consists of a biodegradable material, making it a better option for the environment.
pros: Nice thickness of the bubbles at 3/16"
Available in varying sizes of rolls, including a 2" wide roll, which will be useful for larger items
Good price per square foot vs. some other options
cons: May give off an odd odor
Doesn't work well for heavy items

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this bubble wrap, going by the reviews. Normally I use Duck brand, but needed 2 day delivery so this was the best option at the time. As an artist, I need for my packaging to look good, as well as my paintings. This bubble wrap tore very jagged and the bubbles popped every time I tore at the perforation (which was nearly impossible to locate). I will use the rest of this roll, but going back.to Duck brand!
customer_reviews.author: YogaPants

customer_reviews.title: ) Good bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: Needed supplies for moving. Found this cheaper here on Amazon than any of my local stores. (I also reused the big box it all came in for packing up bedding.) Good bubble wrap, helping keep my crystal and collection of wine glasses safe.
customer_reviews.author: The Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Use
customer_reviews.text: This particular size of roll and size of bubble was perfect for my uses. I have limited storage space for packaging materials, and this roll fit within the space that I had available. This was a bonus. I like the way the bubbles performed during shipment and got many uses out of the roll before it was time to place a re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Boy, does this bubble wrap last!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this does not have 5 out of 5 stars total. This bubble wrap is great material, I love the color, and oh my gosh it is sturdy and it lasts a long time and is very durable! The material is sturdy yet supportive and the amount you get is a ton! The price you cannot beat, I will be purchasing this from the seller as long as they offer it. Truly an awesome option for the moderate to even slightly heavy shipper! I highly recommend this product, unless you need way more because you ship bigger items or on a more enterprise level. This is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Braun

customer_reviews.title: Serious Bubble Wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is some serious bubble wrap. Some might say too serious. I might try for the more laid back bubble wrap next time. But if you need bubble wrap that isn't messing around, this is the bubble wrap for you.
customer_reviews.author: browncoat2511

customer_reviews.title: Eco, perforated, easy tear - love it!
customer_reviews.text: I try to re-use a lot of the packaging I receive in my own orders, but I never get enough bubble wrap - so that I have to buy. I love that this product is eco-friendly, and knowing that it won't sit in a landfill for 100 years in its original state makes me happy - for that I am willing to pay a little more. This comes just as pictured, it is perforated every 12", and it tears very nicely at the perforation. I had a different (non-eco) brand of bubble wrap that was difficult to tear. I haven't had any sheets with popped bubbles - it's a great product and I will re-order when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: Originally when I started ordering this it was a bit difficult to see the tear lines but at least the tears were clean. Now it's more difficult to see the tear lines and the material tears poorly. The outside edges of the roll are rough like it was poorly cut in manufacturing. Time to find a new bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Chiponline

customer_reviews.title: Perforations Were Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value, when compared with other bubble wrap (based on square footage). The perforations are hard to see but easy to use nonetheless - a bit of a pull and the next nearest perforation spot begins to tear away, making it simple to rip off a piece as large as you need (think select-a-size paper towels, this gives you that flexibility, no need to pull out the scissors). I also like that this is a more Earth-friendly product than typical bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: HollyRN

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff if you can find it!
customer_reviews.text: This great bubble wrap was just the right size for my shipping needs. It came very quickly, and when I wanted another role, was no where to be found, dang it! I was stuck waiting for over 3 weeks to receive the Yens 175 ft bubble wrap. I liked the blue color of this EcoBox wrap because it allowed me to see what I had wrapped securely as opposed to what others had wrapped not so well with the typical clear bubble wrap. 😩
customer_reviews.author: PearlWhite

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, flimsy, pop easily.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst bubble wrap I've ever used. The bubbles pop easily and are spaced far apart. American Bubble Boy bubble wrap is the best and I will never use anything else again. (I have no connection to American Bubble Boy brand other than being a customer.)
customer_reviews.author: inhighspeed

customer_reviews.title: Where are the perforations?
customer_reviews.text: They are there, but very hard to find. This is the first perforated bubble wrap I've used that doesn't tear easily. If easy tearing is important to you, look elsewhere. If it doesn't matter, I found the wrap to be excellent. Would be five star if it tore easily and reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lee

customer_reviews.title: I've bought about 70 rolls so far.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -prime delivery -it's blue -perforated every 12" -biodegradable -sturdy bubbles Cons: -On the pricier side -Occasionally the perforation is too faint -the first 12" is wasted due to the lables/tape they use
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: The wheel of material is handy to keep things neat and to measure off what you need. These are the large bubbles but the the product is thinner and not as protective as the product I normally buy. It is more flexible if you use it to protect smaller, thinner items like plates, but less usefull where heavy duty padding is required.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Great price on this bubble wrap I love that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price on this bubble wrap I love that it is biodegradable. My one and only complaint was that it took awhile to figure out where the perforations were for easy tearing. Home Depot's bubble wrap works much better for tearing however it is way more expensive. So all in all I felt this was a really good product and we have passed our used wrap on to someone to else use again too.
customer_reviews.author: V. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Blue Bubble Wrap
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to remove packing tape from this bubble wrap, but was a great deal nonetheless. Still haven't taken the used stuff to be recycled. I might update this review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bubble wrap for moving.
customer_reviews.text: Bubble wrap swerved its purpose. Fairly easy to tear along perforations if you pay attention. I purchased this one for the value and amount of bubble wrap as I could not find a roll of this length anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Stinks, literally.
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell that transfers to wrapped items. Do not use for long term storage. Disintegrated after a couple years into small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Good product but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bubble wrap was great but mine arrived with a hole in the roll that went through more than half the layers. So everything I tried to wrap had these big holes I had to tape closed. I was moving the weekend it arrived so I said screw it and used it, but if I’d had more time I would’ve definitely requested a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JZK

customer_reviews.title: Easy Tear Perforations?  NOT REALLY
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two 24" wide rolls of this and neither roll had perforations - not at 12", not at any spacing... It is a decent product and does the job of cushioning well, but it is not as advertised when it comes to perforations.
customer_reviews.author: CandyO

customer_reviews.title: So-so quality, bubbles pop, not as good as other brands
customer_reviews.text: This was just okay. The bubbles seem to be pop quite easily while you're either ripping the sheet from the roll or wrapping it around a fragile belonging. And that's a problem as you end up with spots where there are no bubble, and simply saran wrap, protecting your belongings. This was definitely not as good as the other product I reviewed.
customer_reviews.author: HalfGeek

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Best bubble I've found so far! Perforated every 12 inches. Bubbles are filled well not almost flat and do not pop easily. I use it to ship fragile items.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: protected my furniture while moving
customer_reviews.text: item was sent to me very quickly. bubble wrap definitely protected my plasma TVs and expensive furniture along with very expensive mirrors while moving; would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Corey Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing
customer_reviews.text: Great for packing when moving all your stuff from one house to another.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dlott

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: I needed 24" wide bubble wrap and wanted to save some money, so I tried this. The description is inaccurate. There are no perforations as described. So you have to find your scissors and cut the darn stuff. An extra step that takes a lot of time when packing a 3400 sq ft house! I'll go back to Duck brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda E. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Ordered many times now.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bubble wrap for my small eBay business! Great price and a very good product. I'm completely satisfied with this type of bubble wrap. Always satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GrantVisions

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Almost commercial quality, good enough for my needs. Every now and then I get a roll that doesn't tear easy at the seams but overall this is my go to bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: you and me

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles already popped or pop while packaging items
customer_reviews.text: Many of the bubbles had already popped and as I packaged items for our upcoming move, I ended up using 2-3xs as much wrap because they would pop as I wrapped fragile items. Smooth items as well, as soon as I would set the piece down, the packing would be useless because all the bubbles would pop. Super frustrating for the price. Going to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Raggle Taggle Gypsy O'

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for protecting oil paintings, glass ware and many other things in my move.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Can not use on heavy items
customer_reviews.text: The bubbles break very easy on this, much easier than the stuff i receive in mailed items
customer_reviews.author: H. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using this wrap for packing fragile items for a move. It is lightweight and easy to use. The price was good for the amount of wrap. I would have given it 5 stars but I do have a bit of a problem seeing the perforated markings that show where to tear the wrap. I did find it easier to look on the underside of the wrap to see where to tear --takes just a little patience!
customer_reviews.author: vee rae

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says at a good price. Good and thick. Used to wrap pictures when we moved
customer_reviews.author: Shea Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wrap furniture, which I shipped. Every piece arrived safely. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Raftery

customer_reviews.title: Its bubble wrap!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Don't understand all the complaints about not tearing at perforations. Worked fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.Engineering

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to store around
customer_reviews.text: I ship vinyl LPs and this makes the most sense for me. Love the 12" perforations, being in the roll I can just stuff it in a closet or above shelves. I do really wish the price was more consistent on here, past few times I've ordered have been a bit more than the past.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Convenient perforations
customer_reviews.text: Quality bubble wrap that offers convenient perforation. Perfect to take to trade shows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No perforations
customer_reviews.text: The bubbles are a great size but break easily. No perforations is so fun.
customer_reviews.author: AZDoodle

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommended
customer_reviews.text: While this is a basic product, it offers an excellent value. The product with the larger bubbles protects much better than the smaller options. Our breakage has dropped and packaging remains about the same size. Strongly recommended Dr. John Hogan CHA CHMS CHE CHO HospitalityEducators Hogan Hospitality
customer_reviews.author: johnjhogan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: HUGE roll. Plenty for us, packing for a move. Scored for convenience. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase, does not protect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst bubble wrap I have ever used. This bubble wrap pops at merely grasping the packed item. While using this bubble wrap to pack paintings, I’ve had to use four or five layers just to be sure it is actually protected. Please, save yourself the money and do not buy. Terrible terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Aloysius

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this for packing art especially -- among other valuables
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this for packing art especially -- among other valuables. I highly recommend it. Leftover is fun to pop, epic for stepping on.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi C

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I have repeatedly ordered this bubble wrap. It's great for packaging and you get a great value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Light Packaging Material
customer_reviews.text: This bubble wrap is nice for cushioning items that I ship. The wrap is light which helps keeps my shipping costs down but also protects the items. I have not had any issues with popped bubbles before shipping but the items that I have shipped have weighed no more than about three pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Orcawhisperer

customer_reviews.title: More Bubble Wrap than I Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm really bad at estimating because I had no idea how monsterously sized this roll was going to be....I'm glad I got more than what I thought I would get, but make sure you have enough space to store a box big enough to ship a human! The girl in the picture must be a lot larger than I am, or they sent the wrong sized roll. Also, the color in the photo is off--it's not periwinkle but a nice crystal blue color, and very lovely :)
customer_reviews.author: Kyt-10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect width for wrapping framed artwork
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bubble wrap to move numerous framed and glass enclosed prints of various sizes. The 24" width made it easy to wrap with a single layer, and the wrap itself is protective without being overly thick. It met my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: it worked
customer_reviews.text: its bubble wrap..not much to say really. you wrap it, you pack it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the 1/2 in. thick bubbles might be too cumbersome to wrap around small or delicate items, but I really wanted to use something eco-friendly to pack up my house. This product is wonderful. Pliable and easy to use, and the perforations work great. They don't tear apart unless you pull them, and then they separate quite easily. I would recommend this to anyone, and will definitely order more in the future. Plus it arrived super fast!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dotson

customer_reviews.title: shipped super quick
customer_reviews.text: this thing literally came the next day i think. it's a giant roll of bubble wrap. it does have perforations every foot or so. using it to insulate the basement windows. yeah. i know it sounds crazy, but it works. a bit. you've gotta tape the strips together and then tape the sheet o bubble wrap to the window. gives a layer of air in between as insulation. great bubble wrap tho.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Feineis

customer_reviews.title: I was satisfied with the price and the performance
customer_reviews.text: it's bubble wrap and it protects fragile items. I don't know what else there is to say. I was satisfied with the price and the performance. I do hope it doesn't biodegrade too soon :)
customer_reviews.author: Ralph S.

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap - for your fragile items AND the environment!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this wrap is biodegradable - and it is soft enough to use to wrap my fragile items effectively. I've tried other wraps that don't work as well. Thanks, Amazon, for adding this to your product line!
customer_reviews.author: Suz M

customer_reviews.title: I use this bubble wrap around the pots of plants ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this bubble wrap around the pots of plants wintering in the unheated side of a greenhouse. Whatever is left of the sixty feet I use to pack and store or mail breakablesrare instance I have have is always a million and one purposes for bubble wrap
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Luongo

customer_reviews.title: Good product. We used it to wrap our stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. We used it to wrap our stuff for moving out. It is easy to use. The bubbles are small but for our case it was perfect. (we moved out to nearby place less than 2 miles so not a big deal for us)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So wanted this product to work. But there is almost no protection.
customer_reviews.author: melissap

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great Dance floor!
customer_reviews.text: We taped strips together and covered our dining room floor with this for my daughters 3rd Trolls Birthday dance party. And passed out squares as party favors. It was awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, works great for shipping bigger items. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. May

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive considering that some lines of it are already ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty expensive considering that some lines of it are already popped from factory but still one of the better deals on this size roll.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I had only a small move and one roll was sufficient. I even used the box it came in. I had some left over so I gave it to the moving company. Well worth the low cost. Nothing was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Marigoldy

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: Serve the purpose, but wrap was quite thin. Would not order again. Only positive was that it was perforated and easy to tear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's low quality
customer_reviews.text: It pops so easily, defeats the purpose of wrapping stuff with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great for packaging fragile gifts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Seems durable, all of the bubbles were intact and I feel like the larger bubble size provides better cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: CaritCake

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is junk the first 10 to 20 feet teared off good but still had lots of bubbles pop as tearing apart now that im 20 feet into roll its no longer perforated and just tears and all the bubbles pop will not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: The M.

customer_reviews.title: Barely Perforated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use to wrap mirrors I make. Barely perforated so pulling made a very ragged messy edge which is unprofessional and ended up cutting which is time-consuming. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great, eco friendly product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great, was so happy to find some eco friendly packing materials as it's always seemed so wasteful in the past. The bubble wrap help up well, nothing broke and you couldn't tell the difference from the usual stuff except that this one breaks down after use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B Deranged

customer_reviews.title: I own a roll of blue packing bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Its packing bubbles. Its blue. When I got it I held it in my arms just like the woman in the picture, but It didnt leave me as joyous as she. I was happy I had packing bubbles. 4 stars happy. The woman in the picture is for sure 5 star happy.
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: great price and useful for protecting items for transportation in box.
customer_reviews.author: IRON GIGANTIS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bubble wrap! I have purchased others from moving companies and retail stores, but they were not the best quality. This bubble wrap is high quality, you get a lot of bang for your buck, and it is worth the extra effort to get it to your door! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1928

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed: It is way thinner and no tear perforations
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand for several years and absolutely loved it but to my disappointment it has been changed. It is now way thinner and the perforation to tear is gone so you need a scissor.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A. Todd

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, 1/2 the bubbles were flat, not U-Haul quality or even close...
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Leffers

customer_reviews.title: Very weak bubblewrap
customer_reviews.text: I cant think of what it might be used to protect because even new it had way more give theb average bubblewrap. And a few months in the whole roll is sagging. I guess the only positive point is its probably biodegradable and its probably decomposing. Not good for my wallet though
customer_reviews.author: J k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for packing up our pictures and breakable items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an amazing value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use this to package my Etsy orders for shipping. It's an amazing value for the money. The quality is good, and the color is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the stuff from UHaul, but didn't tear cleanly. Turns out the perforations are directional - good if you pull in the correct direction, terrible otherwise. Probably wouldn't get again.
customer_reviews.author: ultrafuchsia

customer_reviews.title: It was good.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to wrap my 42in tv and a smaller one. It brings a lot of wrap. It was good.
customer_reviews.author: DYJ82

customer_reviews.title: No perforations
customer_reviews.text: Bubble wrap is OK but there were no perforations -- just one long strip. Description claims perforations every 12 inches.
customer_reviews.author: cos born

customer_reviews.title: Best Eco Friendly Bubble Wrap
customer_reviews.text: I seriously LOVE this bubble wrap because it's biodegradable. Moving produces so much waste. I am actually going to keep all my bubble wrap from this move for the inevitable next one because I loved this bubble wrap so much. It's select-a-size so you can tear off small pieces up to bigger pieces. That makes for way more efficient packing for dishes and breakables. And a small bonus, after you've used it all up, your kid can use the roll for a light saber. Or mega phone. Or both at the same time! I've also had to sacrifice a few pieces to be jumped on and loudly pooped. By the kid of course... mostly....
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Best price per square foot.
customer_reviews.text: Makes packing for a move so easy. Perferations are very helpful and the 24 inch width combined with the 12 inch perfs fill many needs. Easily trimed with scissors. Much better deal than the 12 in wide rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo

customer_reviews.title: nice recycled bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: NICE QUALITY-- recycled plastic, so it gives less GUILT!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Packing for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Does the work, strong and easy to tear pieces in sizes.
customer_reviews.author: ECRamos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works & biodegradable -- wish all packaging were as perfect!
customer_reviews.author: riverwoman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase. won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: 75% of bubbles were popped. Terrible purchase. won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have around the house for the occasional shipping situation
customer_reviews.text: Its bubble wrap. Its big, and its inexpensive. If you do any shipping, then I recommend this. I keep it in the closet and pull it out whenever I sell something on Ebay.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Nice popping action
customer_reviews.text: Great bubble wrap. I purchased this for my 4 year old to crazy popping bubbles. I like that is theoretically biodegradable. It also came in a box with brown packing paper that I used to wrap the present in. Could not be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob F

customer_reviews.title: Super easy way to not add plastic unnecessarily into a ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy way to not add plastic unnecessarily into a trash heap. Though, I admit to being wary to adding this to my compost pile. I might have given it four stars if the product describes in a bit more detail an expected rate at which it might decay.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sadil

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Arrived in time. Perfect for our cross country move!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Price was great - received bubble wrap within days of ordering
customer_reviews.text: Bubble wrap that is perforated every 12 inches (for ease and speed rather than using scissors to cut to size) made wrapping up breakables for a long-distance move so much less time-consuming and easier. Price was great - received bubble wrap within days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This bubble wrap is half the price of the same thing at the big box stores and it's the same quality. I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i insulate my homes windows and doors not used. house much warmer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubble’s quality is not good as usual
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bubble several times and it was all good, good quality for the first few times, but the bubble I receive this time is not good, poor on quality
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hu

customer_reviews.title: Good but pops too easily
customer_reviews.text: Overall average. Good value but the bubbles pop too easily, even from just basic handling
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: Wish this was made in better quality, bubbles popped easily each time I wrapped ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish this was made in better quality, bubbles popped easily each time I wrapped my items. Perforated line is not visible and difficult to locate and rip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubble wrap for days!
customer_reviews.text: Bubble wrap for days! This was so much more bubble wrap than I expected there to be I used it in my move from a 3/2 house and still had bubble wrap left over...for you know FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Camp

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this bubble wrap to wrap 3 really large ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bubble wrap to wrap 3 really large framed watercolor paintings I own. I'm confident they will arrive undamaged at our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a very good job of protecting delicate items being shipped
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Man

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bubble wrap - good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bubble wrap - good quality, nice sized bubbles, kind of sticks to itself so it requires less tape to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Photo1025

customer_reviews.title: fine product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for many projects from protection to packaging. Good stable product. Has seams every 12" or so for easy "cutting".
customer_reviews.author: D. Libby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great value! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I run a small internet ceramic business and rely heavily on bubble wrap for securing my work to ensure a safe delivery. This bubble wrap is great and economical. I will certainly order again!
customer_reviews.author: hadleyclay

customer_reviews.title: Not the best bubble wrap I've used.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying EcoBox bubble wrap. I'm not particularly happy with it an won't order it again. I suppose it's my fault for not noticing the fact that is isn't perforated so you have to manually cut it. It's just something else to watch for when making a buy selection Most concerning is that it seems fragile in that the bubbles seem to pop very easily when I'm putting the package together. I've used a lot of bubble wrap but never encountered weak, anxious to pop bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Don Arnold

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: perfect, exactly what I wanted and the price was unbeatable. Also this product is made in the USA! I always try to buy American made products whenever possible.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Walters

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This was great quality bubble wrap compared to some of the bubble wrap I've picked up on Ebay. It came in blue, but I don't really care about the color. I use it to ship comic books, and it does the job well. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: PDGJr

customer_reviews.title: It's Bubble Wrap
customer_reviews.text: It snaps, crackles, and pops. You simply can not go wrong! Great stress reliever and pretty sure it works great for wrapping things for protective packing and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2TyKy

product_meta.title: EcoBox Bubble Cushion Wrap 24-Inch Wide x 100-Feet Long, with 3/16-Inch Small Bubbles (V-10017)
product_meta.description: Size:24-Inch x 100-Feet Biodegradable Bubble Wrap with 3/16-Inch Small BubblesEconomical and , Eco Box bubble wrap is 100% biodegradable. Great for general packaging and short shipping cycles. Rolls are 100 ft. in length and perforated every 12" for ease of use.
